attributes.action: Make NHS uniforms universal for ALL Trusts
attributes.additional_details:
NHS care should be delivered, and is delivered by the very best healthcare professionals. Different hospitals have different uniforms for different grades.
As with the police and firefighters, the public have the right to know who they are speaking to. A Health Care Assistant in one hospital may have the same uniform as a Nurse Practitioner in another. Make uniforms "UNIFORM" and have an NHS standard uniform throughout the country for all grades, the same as Police, Army, And Fire Service. Surely this is common sense? And easier to understand.
